desc: Hey everyone, we are YouTube Artists producing fluid art, acrylic pouring and resin art. We specialize in painting using wires or 3D printed forms, tools, templates, and patterns.

layout.text:
Truly original art is rare. Artists are inspired by what they see around them - colors, patterns, nature, other art... it's impossible to screen that knowledge out and not be influenced by it.
Instead we choose to embrace it, to discuss it, to learn from others, and to share it.
